channel.title: Team Player Award Thread
channel.description:
[quote="Arete, post:1, topic:83344"] **DatBird:** Where are winners announced?
**AreteBird:** There will be a special thread that announces winners, and records all previous winners. [/quote]
# Welcome to the Team Player Award thread! In this thread, winners of the Team Player Award will be announced and logged.
(This is *not* a discussion thread.)
# Most recent winners:
Town Team Player award: @Chloe
Scum Team Player award: @Windwardaway
# Historical Winners
### Town |**Player**|**Game**|**Date**| |---|---|---| |Anagram|Purgatory III| 8/26/20 |Appelsiini|Wild West FM|9/3/20 | Whysper | FoL 30 | 9/6/20 | Whysper | Watch Your Mouth 2 | 9/20/20 |Marshal|Harry Potter FM|10/1/20 |Edmond_Bailey|SFoL 64|10/1/20 |Hippoyeetus|Umineko|10/15/20 |Arete|Corrupt Votes|10/16/20 |ScaledSlinky|Hall of the Incendiary|10/26/20 |Surge|Shortnight|11/1/20 |clonedcheese|Return of the King|11/12/20 |SirDerpsALot|Deus Ex 4|11/18/20 |WindwardAway|Newbie-Friendly Pokèmon 9er|12/2/20 |osieorb18| `VA-11 HALL-A` GREATEST IDEA|12/11/20 |Light|Countries FM|12/22/20 |Nyan-chan|Catgirl Jester Nightless|12/23/20 |eevee|JoatJoatJoat13er|1/5/21 |Nightingale |Gay Mafia 3|1/12/21 |Blizer and Marshal|Morphogenetic Mafia|1/20/21 |KyoDaz| Yes, We Can’t Have Nice Things Because This Is A Clown Fiesta Sequel|1/28/21 |Wazza|EFoL4|1/31/21 |Arete|Shortnight 2: Return of the POGGERS|2/8/21 |Marluxion|SFoL 65: Reminiscence Of Adiart Village|2/21/21 |Chloe| Umineko FM: Turn of the Golden Witch|3/7/21 ### Scum
|**Player**|**Game**|**Date**| |---|---|---| | Darth_Tabor| Purgatory III| 8/26/20 |Centuries|Wild West FM|9/3/20 | Alice | FoL 30 | 9/6/20 | Appelsiini | Watch Your Mouth 2 | 9/20/20 |Centuries|Harry Potter FM|10/1/20 |Alice_Alard|SFoL 64|10/1/20 |Rue|Umineko|10/15/20 |Appelsiini|Corrupt Votes|10/16/20 |GGhana|Hall of the Incendiary|10/26/20 |Arete|Shortnight|11/1/20 |Mistyx|Return of the King|11/12/20 |Eevee|Deus Ex 4|11/18/20 |Kiroshimiro|Newbie-Friendly Pokèmon 9er|12/2/20 |Surge| `VA-11 HALL-A` GREATEST IDEA|12/11/20 |Whysper|Countries FM|12/22/20 |ChibiCat|Catgirl Jester Nightless|12/23/20 |Marluxion|JoatJoatJoat13er|1/5/21 |UwU|Gay Mafia 3|1/12/21 |Maple and Ephemeral|Morphogenetic Mafia|1/20/21 |Icibalus| Yes, We Can’t Have Nice Things Because This Is A Clown Fiesta Sequel|1/28/21 |Shurian|EFoL 4|1/31/21 |Firekitten|Shortnight 2: Return of the POGGERS|2/8/21 |Leafia|SFoL65: Reminiscence Of Adiart Village|2/21/21 |Windwardaway| Umineko FM: Turn of the Golden Witch|3/7/21

item.title: Team Player Award Thread
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
Announcement Regarding Team Player Awards

After discussing it with the community and amongst ourselves, we have decided it best to cut the Team Player Awards system, as it is not serving the purpose we initially intended, and a large portion of you have expressed this sentiment as well.

When we created this system we wanted to use it as a way to motivate players to become better at the team aspect of FM, as well as promote a positive community where we support and recognize eachother’s skills and improvement.

We plan on replacing this per-game system with something similar to yearly awards, or perhaps even twice yearly, so that we can come together and celebrate as a community, along with giving people something to look forward to. This is not set in stone, however, and we will update you all as things are soldified.

Thank you all for your constructive feedback, and we hope we can continue to flourish as a community, and appreciate eachother. Other updates regarding FM-moderation practices are in the works as well.

Cheers,
The Forum of Lies Moderation Team

Read full topic
